mapper.sql: id, ss_payment_bill_id, sb_group_detail_id, bq_num, bj_num, bq_base_e, bj_base_e, bq_base_p, bj_base_p, ratio_e, ratio_p, bq_amount_e, bj_amount_e, bq_amount_p, bj_amount_p, subtotal
mapper.insert: insert into ss_payment_bill_detail (id, ss_payment_bill_id, sb_group_detail_id, bq_num, bj_num, bq_base_e, bj_base_e, bq_base_p, bj_base_p, ratio_e, ratio_p, bq_amount_e, bj_amount_e, bq_amount_p, bj_amount_p, subtotal) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ssPaymentBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sbGroupDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bqNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bqBaseE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjBaseE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bqBaseP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjBaseP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ratioE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ratioP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bqAmountE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjAmountE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bqAmountP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjAmountP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

id,

mapper.update:
update ss_payment_bill_detail
ss_payment_bill_id = #{ssPaymentBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sb_group_detail_id = #{sbGroupDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bq_num = #{bqNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bj_num = #{bjNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bq_base_e = #{bqBaseE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bj_base_e = #{bjBaseE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bq_base_p = #{bqBaseP,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bj_base_p = #{bjBaseP,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ratio_e = #{ratioE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ratio_p = #{ratioP,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bq_amount_e = #{bqAmountE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bj_amount_e = #{bjAmountE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bq_amount_p = #{bqAmountP,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bj_amount_p = #{bjAmountP,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ss_payment_bill_detail set ss_payment_bill_id = #{ssPaymentBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sb_group_detail_id = #{sbGroupDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bq_num = #{bqNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bj_num = #{bjNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bq_base_e = #{bqBaseE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bj_base_e = #{bjBaseE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bq_base_p = #{bqBaseP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bj_base_p = #{bjBaseP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ratio_e = #{ratioE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ratio_p = #{ratioP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bq_amount_e = #{bqAmountE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bj_amount_e = #{bjAmountE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bq_amount_p = #{bqAmountP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bj_amount_p = #{bjAmountP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select d.*,gd.prod_id,gd.prod_name from ss_payment_bill_detail d left join ss_payment_bill b on d.ss_payment_bill_id=b.id left join sb_group_detail gd on d.sb_group_detail_id=gd.id where d.ss_payment_bill_id=#{ssPaymentBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and b.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select sum(d.bq_amount_e) bq_amount_e, sum(d.bj_amount_e) bj_amount_e, sum(d.bq_amount_p) bq_amount_p, sum(d.bj_amount_p) bj_amount_p, sum(d.subtotal) subtotal from ss_payment_bill_detail d left join ss_payment_bill b on d.ss_payment_bill_id=b.id where d.ss_payment_bill_id=#{ssPaymentBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and b.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
